name: Kaydera_Kay
content:
Kaydera Kay was a human female street criminal who was active during the Galactic Civil War. Over time, she had mastered the skill of appearing and disappearing at will.
During the Uprising against Governor Ubrik Adelhard's Iron Blockade of the Anoat sector, Kay joined the crew of a young smuggler and participated in various missions to undermine the Galactic Empire's rule of the sector.
Kay was often known to be crass and obnoxious.
Kay was created for Star Wars: Uprising, a 2015 canon mobile video game developed by Kabam for iOS and Android operating systems.
